name: Bombus - Alpha
description:
Bombus is a bee themed 3D collectathon where you run and jump around, collecting honey and bees. Use your pollen gun to make plants grow and your hover ability to double jump and reach further platforms.

Goal:

Collect all the bees

Subgoal:

Collect all the honey

Hint:

Spray green "buds" with the pollen gun to make "flowers" grow

Controls:

Movement - WASD

Jump - SPACEBAR

Hover - Double Jump, SPACEBAR while in the air (When Unlocked Hover)

Pollen Spray - Left Click, can Hold action (When Unlocked Pollen Gun)

Aim Pollen Gun - Right Click, can Hold action

Pollen Shot - Left Click while aiming (When Unlocked Pollen Gun)

Pause Game - P Key

Feature:

The "Flower Bed acts as both a checkpoint, respawn location, and a healing spot.

Note: Demo is only for Windows PCs
